Clawstorm: Artillery?!? What's the point?

His mouth was gapping open and his voice became a whispering 
complaint.

Clawstorm: I'm made to be fearsome in close combat. You think these 
talons can just shoot and grow back?

He calmed himself just a little.

Clawstorm: Alright then. Let's go meet Tyrael.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : DeathStar : :
> 
> DeathStar: No full combat. We would be outnumberd and they have an 
> experianced commander in Rodimus Prime. I'll allow some artillary 
> strikes on their base, however.
>
